404-description: Slim, it seems that there is nothing to do here, but there are plenty of things to discover on the map
alert-owner_only-tooltip: Only you can see this message.
cookiebar-description: We use cookies to help us better understand how the website is used and optimized. By continuing to use this site, you agree to this policy.
email_confirmation-error-description:
Something went wrong, this can be a network error or something else ... Could you try again to click on the link provided in the email?

If you can't validate your email address, please contact us at: contact@localementbon.com < / p>
email_confirmation-processing-descriptio: We are in the process of validation of your email address.
email_confirmation-success-description: Your email address is validated, you can now enjoy all the features available on Localement Bon
feedback_form-success-description: Thank you for writing to us. We will contact you soon. See you on Localement Bon.
feedback_form-success-title: We need your feedback (we really do!)
feedback_modal-alert: Thank you in advance for your feedback and suggestions. Each feedback is very important for us so do not hesitate to be as complete as possible to help us improve Localement Bon.
footer-copyright: Launched in 2020 by William and Matthew
footer-feedback-description: Give us your feedback about the website or tell us if you have some ideas!
geolcation_confirm-description: Your browser will ask for your permission for us to access your GPS location. We do not store this information in our server. Do you wish to continue ?
geolocation-fetching_position: We are searching for your position
home-last_places-h2: New members of the community Localement Bon
home-last_places-p: Discover the new producer who have decided to join Localement Bon. Producing and producers eager to share their products and their expertise to the community.
home-meta-description: Thousands of places of production and distribution of local products referenced on a simple interactive map of use.
home-meta-title: Discover all the producers and local producers in direct sales around you with our interactive map
home-product_type_list-p: Click on a product below to view the map Localement Bon and discover all the producers and local producers that offer the direct sale around!
home-title-h1: Put our local production at the center of the table
home-title-p_lead: Discover all the producers and local producers in direct sales around you with our interactive map
home-why-client-h2: You are or want to become a locavore
home-why-client-p-01: Find places of production and sales directly around you through our interactive map. You can even add new network if you want to share your favorite places in the community!
home-why-client-p-02: Save your producer and enjoy preferred future features as we develop progressively.
home-why-client-p-03: Supporting producer in your area, it is also actively involved in enriching your community.
home-why-owner-h2: You are a producer or producer
home-why-owner-p-01: Localement Bon wants to facilitate the connection between you and the people in your area who wish to consume what you produce.
home-why-owner-p-02: By adding your business to the network Localement Bon, you increase free visibility of your products on the Internet.
home-why-owner-p-03: You need a feature that is not present on the application? Let's talk about it ! Contact us at the bottom of the page, we will be happy to discuss your needs.
list_sbc-description: Buy fresh produce directly from local producers on Localement Bon. Support short circuits and direct sales.
list_sbc-pt-description: Buy direct from local producers in {{city}} on Localement Bon. Support short circuits and direct sales.
list_sbc-title: Direct sales from producer in France - Localement Bon
lost_password-description: Please provide the email address of your account, we will send you an email with instructions to reset your password.
lost_password-success-description: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password.
map-meta-description: Discover all local productions addresses listed in a simple interactive map to use!
modal_ownership_claim-alert-description: We will conduct a quick check of your identity in the following steps. If you are not really owner or manager of this company, we invite you to ask the right person on Localement Bon that she / he can do in turn.
modal_ownership_claim-description: You are the / manager / representative of this place? Join in on owner Localement Bon. You can update the information, add photos and get in touch with users who have added your favorite short circuit.
modal_ownership_claim-error_duplicate-de: You have already claimed ownership of this place, we will promptly get in touch with you, keep an eye on your inbox!
modal_ownership_claim-error_global-descr: An error occured and we are sorry. Do you want to try again? If this persists, you can contact us on contact@localementbon.com. Thank you !
modal_ownership_claim-success-descriptio: Congratulations and thank you for having claimed ownership of this place. We will contact you by email to start the verification process. Once validated quick step, you will be indeed a member of the community producers Localement Bon. Keep an eye on your mailbox and very fast.
modal_ownership_claim-switch-description: I confirm that the / manager of this business and I would become the owner on Localement Bon
new_place-change_user-title: Want to add this producer with another account?
new_place-error-description: It seems that something did not work. This may be a connection problem or some of the information provided is not correct. Could you check and try again? Thank you !
new_place-processing-description: We're creating your account and enter the location you want to add to our database. One moment please.
new_place-step_00-card-member-descriptio: I am not / the production owner but I want to share a new address
new_place-step_00-card-owner-description: I am / manager and / or representative at this
new_place-success-description:
Everything went well, thank you for having added a new producer to share with the community Localement Bon!

This does not appear immediately on the map. Indeed, we will conduct an audit before publishing. We do our best to make this process as fast as possible.

If you've said (e) the owner of the place in the first step, watch your inbox. We will contact you to finalize your registration.

Thanks again for being part of the community Localement Bon!
new_place-user_claiming_ownership-info-d: You identified yourself as the owner of the place you want to add. We will be in touchwith you via the email address on your account to check that you are the owner within 48 hours.
onboarding-carousel-step_01-description: Our producers need you. Localement Bon is a young platform and many places are still missing. Participate by adding new shorts directly via the menu.
onboarding-carousel-step_02-description: To better understand the project Localement Bon, take a few minutes to read our approach
onboarding-carousel-step_03-description: Make the most of our geolicalisation to discover the producers around you. And help your friends by sharing Localement Bon.
onboarding-carousel-step_04-description: Our desire is also and especially to highlight the thousands of local producers. Use the features to track, share and finally showcase all of our great products.
onsite_distribution-option-no: No, there is no sale on site
place-onsite_distribution-dont_know: This producer has may be an on-site point of sale.
place-onsite_distribution-no: This producer does not have point of sale on-site.
place-onsite_distribution-yes: This short circuit has an on-site point of sale.
place_address-1-placeholder: Indicate number + street + town Ex: 22 rue d'Orl√©ans, 33560, Libourne
place_details-bookmark-add_text: Add this producer in your favorites to take advantage of future capabilities Localement Bon
place_details-description-no_description: We do not have a description yet for this place as the owner hasn't added one
Buy your fresh produce at {{placeLabel}} directly from the source thanks to Localement Bon. Support short circuits and direct sales.
We do not have a description for this place as the owner isn't registered yet on Localement Bon
place_details-owner-no_avatar-warning: You have not added a profile picture. You can do it from editing your profile by clicking on the message.
place_details-owner-no_description-warni: You have not added a description. You can do it from the edition of your property by clicking on the message.
place_details-owner-no_images-warning: You have not added any pictures of your business, it's a shame! Pictures increase your visibility. If you want, you can add from the edition of your property by clicking on the message.
place_details-owner-no_phone-warning: You have not added any phone number. You can do it from the edition of your property by clicking on the message.
place_details-places_nearby: There are other establishments very close to here!
place_details-warning-not_validated-desc: This producer has not yet been validated by our team, so it is not visible to the public.
place_images-advices: Great photos of your business will allow you to put yourself forward in our search engine! (We recommend pictures in landscape format, ideally a minimum width of 1200px)
place_images-rules: You can upload up to 5 pictures with a maximum weight of 500KB each.
place_mail-placeholder: The email address to get in touch with the producer
place_timetable-placeholder: Ex: Monday to Friday from 10am to 5pm
places_list-no_result: Ah ... We did not find any producer in this sector. But if you know of one, feel free to add it!
product-type_common_search-placeholder: Add one or more product types
reset_password-error-description:
Something went wrong, this can be a network error or something else ... Could you retry click on the link provided in the email we sent?

If you can not validate your email address, please contact us at: contact@localementbon.com < / p>
reset_password-success-description: Your new password was successfully changed! You can now sign in to your account.
search_bar-search_input-placeholder: A name, a town, a zip code?
search_by_city-description-headContent: Direct sales of {{productTypeName}} at local producers in {{cityName}} on Localement Bon. Support short circuits and direct sales.
search_by_city-description-meta: Direct sales of {{productTypeName}} at local producers in {{cityName}} on Localement Bon. Support short circuits and direct sales.
search_by_city-title-headContent: Direct sales of {{productTypeName}} to the producers in {{cityName}}
sign-no_account-title: Do not have an account yet ?
sign-signingIn-description: You will be connected automatically in a few moments.
signin-errors-description: The email address or password does not exist or is incorrect.
signin-errors-spam-description: You tried too many times. Please try again in 1 minutes.
upload-network_error: A problem occurred during the download
user_account-bookmarks-add_bookmarks: Adding producer favorite for the map!
user_account-bookmarks-no_bookmarks: You do not have any favorites yet.
user_account-manage_places-no_places: You are the owner of any business
user_account-manage_places-no_validated-: This producer has not yet been validated by our team.
user_account-manage_places-validated-exp: Your business is visible on the interactive map
user_form-email-duplicate: This address is already in use.
user_form-email_disabled: To change your email, please contact us.
user_form-newsletter-label: I want to receive the latest news Localement Bon.
user_route-description: Plan your route before you go! You can add up 8 places to build it.
